sys_openapi_operation.name: Retrieves or creates an option for a given dropdown.
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Retrieves or creates an option for a given dropdown.","fOperationId":"getOrCreateDropdownValue","fDescription":"If an option with the given name (case-insensitive) already exists, the id of that option is returned. If the existing option was archived, it will be unarchived. If no option with the given name exists, a new option is created, and the id of the created option is returned.

| Permission | Remarks | | --- | --- | | Operator | With read permission on any asset type (if the checkbox 'Users can add options' is checked for the given dropdown) or write permission on asset templates (otherwise). | | Person | No access |","fPath":"/assetmgmt/dropdowns/{dropdownId}","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson7046875503","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/DropdownOptionName","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"An option with the given name already exists.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson8804083817","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/DropdownOptionId","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"201","fDescription":"A new option with the given name is created.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson1432463629","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/DropdownOptionId","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • The given name is null, blank or too long (more than 60 characters).
","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson9665992703","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/BadRequestEntity","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • The specified dropdown does not exist.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"dropdownId","fDescription":"The field key of the dropdown for which to retrieve or create an option.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"dropdownId9616288658","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
sys_openapi_operation.sys_name: Retrieves or creates an option for a given dropdown.
